model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: It really depends! Personally, I love the castles! Visby is probably my favorite spot. 

[MEMORY]
1. Speaker A and Speaker B plan to travel to Sweden together.
2. Speaker A is considering visiting their cousin in Sweden and needs to save money for the trip.
3. Speaker A has a cousin in Sweden but has not visited the country.
4. Speaker B misses Sweden and has fond memories of the country.
5. Speaker B recommends checking out the volcanoes in Sweden for a unique experience.
6. Speaker B has not visited Sweden for a long time due to the high expenses.
current_dialogue: Speaker B: It really depends! Personally, I love the castles! Visby is probably my favorite spot.
